text: Tomás Pedro Regalado y Valdez (born May 24, 1947) is a Cuban-American politician and former broadcast journalist. He was the 42nd Mayor of Miami, Florida from 2009 to 2017. He is a member of the Republican Party, although as Miami Mayor, his office is nonpartisan.http://miamidadecode.org/3.03/ ==References== ==Other websites== * Tomás Pedro Regalado at miamigov.com * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Miami Category:American journalists Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Havana
title: Tomás Pedro Regalado
